mapper.select: select count(history_menu), TO_CHAR(history_now, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as history_now from tb_history where history_menu= '코드 관리' group by TO_CHAR(history_now, 'YYYY-MM-DD');
SELECT HISTORY_MENU FROM TB_HISTORY WHERE HISTORY_MENU IS NOT NULL GROUP BY HISTORY_MENU;
SELECT HISTORY_NOW, HISTORY_IP, HISTORY_MENU, MENU_URL FROM TB_HISTORY
